title: It's All Your Fault
description: Up until forty-eight hours ago, Caitlin had Tasted alcohol, kissed a boy, sang in public at the top of her lungs, kidnapped anyone or --- WHAT? STOLEN A CONVERTIBLE? Now she's in jail and has no idea what to The police, her parents, the mayor, all of those camera crews and everyone on Twitter. She has just noticed Her nose is pierced and -- WAIT? IS THAT A TATTOO? She blames one person for the entire insane Her famous cousin. Who is also her former best friend. Who she has HATED for the past four years. Who she also might miss like crazy. IT'S ALL YOUR FAULT, HELLER HARRIGAN!!!!
author: Paul   Rudnick
